name: 吳景龍
objective:
針對高級班學生強化以英文思考及批判整合之進階英文能力，本課程以經典及流行之英文電影為主要教材，分析及應用進階英文的架構、風格及語言特色。
This course enables non-English majors at the advanced level to understand American movies embedded in English language expressions. Students will learn that the movie and language are  guided to culture, and on the other hand, culture programs language patterns. Selected films will be introduce in the class as well as movie theory and practice,etc.
schedule:
Syllabus 課程表:
Week 1: Introduction Theory and Prctice of the Movie.
Week 2: Discuss issues and concepts raised in movies (1).
Week 3: Discuss issues and concepts raised in movies (2).
Week 4: Develop critical thinking about how to appreciate the movies.(1)
Week 5: Develop critical thinking about how to appreciate the movies.(2)
Week 6: Movie Appreciation 1
Week 7: Group Discussion
Week 8: Group Presention 1
Week 9: Midterm Exam or Report.
Week 10: Movie Appreciation 2
Week 11: Group Discussion
Week 12: Group Presention 2
Week 13: Movie Appreciation 3
Week 14: Group Discussion
Week 15: Group Presention 3
Week 17: Idiomatic Expression in Movies
Week 18: Final Exam or Report.
scorePolicy:
Percentile of final grades 成績配分:
1. Group presentation in the class or Midterm Exam:  20 %
2. Individual tasks (final report, solo presentation, or final exam): 20%
3. Attendance: 20%
4. Assignments and participation in the classroom discussions: 20 % 
(five absences leading to failure)
4. English proficiency test: 20%
